resources.string: These Permissions are needed to send and receive mail
Are you sure you wish to discard this delectable piece of writing?
Hold down on Delivery Address field to select location
All fields must be filled before submitting
Your mail is waiting for you to pick it up!
Your mail is in transit, be patient!
Mail is not yet available to read!
Delivery Location is needed to send mail!
Simulation mode. Click anywhere on the map to set your current location.
